animal.question: I meow and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I moo and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
⚫️ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Farmers might put a bell around my neck.

animal.question: I quack and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I like to swim in a pond.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat grains.

animal.question: I say 'Neigh' and you can ride on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐎 I can run very fast.
👩‍🌾 People use me on farms.

animal.question: I oink and love to play in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I am often pink.
🌽 I eat corn.
🐽 I have a snout.

animal.question: I chirp and fly in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐦 I build nests in trees.
🪱 I eat worms.
🎶 I sing a sweet song.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my body.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐾 I am a very strong cat.

animal.question: I have a trunk and big ears, and I never forget. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm cold!
🐑 I look like tiny sheep.
☃️ You can make snowballs with me.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I come out during the day.
🌻 I help flowers grow.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I make things wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella for me.
💧 I sound like 'pitter-patter'.
🕳️ Puddles like to form when I fall.

weather.question: I move the trees and make the leaves swirl. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Sometimes I'm gentle, sometimes I'm strong.
🌬️ I'm invisible, but you can feel me.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I blow.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can be big or small.
💧 I'm made of tiny water droplets.
🐑 Sometimes I look like animals.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm shaped like an arc.
☀️ You can only see me when the sun is shining.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I'm cold and icy, and I fall from the sky in the winter. I'm smaller than snow.

hints.text: 🧊 Sometimes I hurt when I hit you!
🚗 Driving can be dangerous when I fall.
🧊 I'm frozen rain.

weather.question: I can block the sun and make it dark, but I'm not a cloud. I'm very thick and hard to see through. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I often happen early in the morning.
🚗 Driving is difficult when I'm around.
👻 It feels like you're walking through a spooky world.

weather.question: Sometimes I'm dark and scary, and I bring lots of rain, wind, and maybe even lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ You should stay inside when I come.
🌧️ I can cause floods.
⛈️ I'm a big storm.

weather.question: I'm frozen water that falls from the sky. Every one of me is different, like a tiny work of art. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can catch me on your tongue.
👐 We have six sides.
📷 We make pretty pictures on windows.
